name: The Last Little Monster (LD33)
description:
Coarse sketch for a 2D platforming roguelike (no death in this version).

A migrant monster is trying to make its way back through a hostile foreign land to its distant home.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys.

Up - Jump / Double Jump

Down - Attack

Attack humans and collect coins.

Double Jump expends all your power, allowing you to jump to other planets.
